data.aicreationcommand: analyzes metadata inputs (e.g. title, caption, description, keywords, alt text, document content, audio/video transcript) and identifies high-level semantic topics that describe the underlying concepts, emotions, actions, and themes. Focus on the essence of what is happening — abstract ideas, moods, and relationships — NOT generic object names unless they are essential to the concept..

data.notes: (NER: Named Entity Recognition) is most useful when you need to extract concrete facts (companies, people, locations, products) for building indexes, knowledge graphs, or searchable databases
data.aicreationcommand: analyzes metadata inputs (e.g. title, caption, description, keywords, alt text, document content) extract concrete facts (companies, people, locations, products) for building indexes
